power.title: Chromatic Bolt
power.fluff: You loose a crackling piece of raw chaos against your foes

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and one creature within 5 squares of the target takes psychic damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

powerelement.name: Level 11:
powerelement.text: 3 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

powerelement.name: Level 21:
powerelement.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and 6 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

power.title: Dire Radiance
power.fluff: You cause a shaft of brilliant, cold and excruciating starlight to lance down from above, brighter and deadlier the closer your foe moves to you

powerelement.text: If the target willingly moves nearer to you before the start of your next turn, it takes radiant damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

powerelement.name: Level 11:
powerelement.text: 6 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus radiant damage.

powerelement.name: Level 21:
powerelement.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and 10 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus radiant damage.

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: The first square of movement the target takes towards you before the start of your next turn costs an additional square.

power.title: Echoing Dirge
power.fluff: Shadows swirl around your foes, drawing forth dark memories that cause them to recoil in fear

powerelement.name: Target:
powerelement.text: One, two or three creatures in the blast

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: You push the target up to 2 squares.

power.title: Eldritch Blast
power.fluff: You fire a bolt of dark, crackling eldritch energy at your foe

powerelement.name: Special:
powerelement.text: This power counts as a ranged basic attack.

power.title: Eldritch Bolt
power.fluff: With a gesture, you create a shard of shimmering force and send it streaking toward your foe

powerelement.name: Special:
powerelement.text: This power counts as a ranged basic attack.

power.title: Eldritch Strike
power.fluff: Forming a crude weapon from eldritch energies, you attack and drive your enemy before you

powerelement.name: Special:
powerelement.text: This power counts as a melee basic attack.

power.title: Eyebite
power.fluff: You glare at your enemy with eyes gleaming with brilliant colors, and your foe reels under your mental assault that makes you vanish from its sight

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you are invisible to the target until the start of your next turn.

powerelement.name: Miss:
powerelement.text: You gain concealment against the target until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Fascinating Shadows
power.fluff: You create a dizzying array of images out of the shadows, lulling your enemies into drawing closer

powerelement.name: Target:
powerelement.text: One, two, or three creatures in the blast

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage, and you pull the target up to 2 squares.

powerelement.name: Level 11:
powerelement.text: 3 + Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

powerelement.name: Level 21:
powerelement.text: 6 + Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: The first time the target attacks you before the end of your next turn, it takes psychic damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

powerelement.name: Level 11:
powerelement.text: 3 + Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

powerelement.name: Level 21:
powerelement.text: 6 + Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

power.title: Freezing Claws
power.fluff: A freezing cloud wraps around your foe, turning into icy claws that rend it if it moves

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: If the target moves during its next turn, it takes cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

powerelement.name: Level 11:
powerelement.text: 4 + Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement modifier cold damage.

powerelement.name: Level 21:
powerelement.text: 8 + Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement modifier cold damage.

power.title: Gift of Avernus
power.fluff: You lash forth with a crackling ray of arcane power, releasing part of your life force to ensure that the hellish bolt sears your foe

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: You take damage equal to your level.
You have combat advantage for the attack

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 1d12 + Charisma modifier + your Constitution modifier damage.

powerelement.name: Level 11:
powerelement.text: 1d12 + Charisma modifier + twice your Constitution modifier damage.

powerelement.name: Level 21:
powerelement.text: 2d12 + Charisma modifier + twice your Constitution modifier damage.

powerelement.name: Miss:
powerelement.text: You take damage equal to half your level and reroll the attack without combat advantage. You only do this once each time you use this power.

power.title: Hand of Blight
power.fluff: A crackling black sphere gathers around your outspread hand, ready for you to smite a nearby foe with it or fling it at a distant enemy

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 1d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage.
Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to either you or an ally within 5 squares of you.

powerelement.name: Level 21:
powerelement.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage.

powerelement.name: Miss:
powerelement.text: The target grants you combat advantage for your first attack against it before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hellish Rebuke
power.fluff: You point your finger, and your foe is scoured in hellish flames stoked by your own anger and even brighter when you are injured

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: The first time you take damage before the end of your next turn, the target takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

powerelement.name: Level 11:
powerelement.text: 4 + Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement modifier fire damage.

powerelement.name: Level 21:
powerelement.text: 8 + Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement modifier fire damage.

power.title: Mind Shadows
power.fluff: Reality unravels into darkness around your enemy, breaking its grip on sanity

powerelement.text: Until the end of your next turn, allies 3 or more squares away from the target are invisible to it.

powerelement.name: Miss:
powerelement.text: Choose one of your allies. Until the end of your next turn, when the chosen ally is 3 or more squares away from the target, he or she is invisible to it.

power.title: Spiteful Glamor
power.fluff: The mere sight of you is anathema to your enemy

powerelement.text: If the target is bloodied but you are not, the damage increases to 2d10 + Charisma modifier, but the target gains +2 to attack you until the start of your next turn.

powerelement.name: Level 11:
powerelement.text: 3d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage if the target is bloodied but you are not.

powerelement.name: Level 21:
powerelement.text: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, or 4d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage if the target is bloodied but you are not.

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: If you are not bloodied, the target gains combat advantage against you until the start of your next turn.
